mapper.select: /* findAllBoard */ SELECT BDD_SEQ, BDS_SEQ, BDD_USER, BDD_TITLE, BDD_WRITER, BDD_CONTENT, BDD_CDATE, BDD_IP, BDD_HIT, BDD_UPLOAD, BDD_DATE_MAGAM ,BDD_REPLY_COUNT, BDD_REPLY_LASTDATE, BDD_GROUP, BDD_NOTICE, BDD_INTRA, BDD_IMPORTANCE, BDD_DATE_WORKB, BDD_DATE_WORKE ,BDD_PROJECT, BDD_INCHARGE, BDD_CENTER, BDD_TARGET, BDD_DATA_TYPE, BDD_STATE, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('CM05', BDD_CENTER) AS BDD_CENTER_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(BDDC_CENTER) FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER BDC WHERE BDC.BDD_SEQ=A.BDD_SEQ) AS BDD_CENTER_TOTAL , (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN TRIM(BDDC_CENTER_USER) is NULL THEN 0 WHEN TRIM(BDDC_CENTER_USER) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER BDC WHERE BDC.BDD_SEQ=A.BDD_SEQ) AS BDD_CENTER_READ , (SELECT CASE FU_GETUSER_NM(BDDC_CENTER_USER) WHEN NULL THEN '미수신' ELSE CONCAT(FU_GETUSER_NM(BDDC_CENTER_USER),' (', date_format(BDDC_CENTER_DATE, '%m-%d %h:%i'), ')') END FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER WHERE BDD_SEQ=A.BDD_SEQ AND BDDC_CENTER = #{bddcCenter}) AS BDD_GET_INFO , (SELECT COUNT(BDDC_CENTER) FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER_FILE BDCF WHERE BDCF.BDD_SEQ=A.BDD_SEQ) AS BDD_CENTER_DONE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER WHERE BDD_SEQ=A.BDD_SEQ AND BDDC_CENTER=#{bddcCenter} AND TRIM(BDDC_CENTER_USER) IS NOT NULL ) AS BDD_READ_COUNT , CASE BDD_DATA_TYPE WHEN 'B' THEN '-' ELSE (SELECT CASE COUNT(*) WHEN 0 THEN '회신전' ELSE '회신완료' END FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER_FILE WHERE BDD_SEQ=A.BDD_SEQ AND BDDC_CENTER=#{bddcCenter} AND TRIM(BDCF_WRITER_USER) IS NOT NULL ) END AS BDD_REPLY_YN , (SELECT CONCAT(FU_GETUSER_NM(BDDR_CENTER_USER),' (', date_format(BDDR_CENTER_DATE, '%m-%d %H:%i'), ')') FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER_RCEPT WHERE BDD_SEQ=A.BDD_SEQ AND BDDR_CENTER = #{bddcCenter}) AS BDDR_GET_INFO FROM TB_BOARD_DATA A WHERE BDS_SEQ = 'demand' AND BDD_STATE = 'C' limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

/* countBoard */
SELECT COUNT(BDD_SEQ) AS TOTCNT FROM TB_BOARD_DATA WHERE BDD_STATE = 'C' AND BDS_SEQ = 'demand'

/* findOneBoard */
SELECT BDD_SEQ, BDS_SEQ, BDD_USER, BDD_TITLE, BDD_WRITER, BDD_CONTENT, BDD_CDATE, BDD_IP, BDD_HIT, BDD_UPLOAD, BDD_DATE_MAGAM , BDD_REPLY_COUNT, BDD_REPLY_LASTDATE, BDD_GROUP, BDD_NOTICE, BDD_INTRA, BDD_IMPORTANCE, BDD_DATE_WORKB, BDD_DATE_WORKE , BDD_PROJECT, BDD_INCHARGE, BDD_CENTER, BDD_TARGET, BDD_DATA_TYPE, BDD_STATE, FN_GET_CODE_NAME('CM05', BDD_CENTER) AS BDD_CENTER_NAME , IFNULL((SELECT CONCAT(FU_GETUSER_NM(BDCC_CENTER_USER), ' (처음열람일 : ', BDCC_CENTER_DATE, ')') FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER_CHECK WHERE BDD_SEQ=BD.BDD_SEQ AND BDCC_CENTER=#{bddcCenter} LIMIT 1 ), '-') AS THIS_READ_INFO , (SELECT CASE FU_GETUSER_NM(BDDR_CENTER_USER) WHEN NULL THEN '미수신' ELSE CONCAT(FU_GETUSER_NM(BDDR_CENTER_USER),' (', BDDR_CENTER_DATE, ')') END FROM TB_BOARD_DATA_CENTER_RCEPT WHERE BDD_SEQ=BD.BDD_SEQ AND BDDR_CENTER = #{bddcCenter}) AS BDDR_GET_INFO FROM TB_BOARD_DATA BD WHERE BDD_SEQ = #{bddSeq}

/* BoardDataReadSelect */
